name: Bumper Buster
description:
Bumper buster is a party game where up to 4 players will fight in various minigames  a minigame, with the objective to be the one with the highest score or the last one standing.

UI and Multiplayer Programmer = Baris Ozguz

Gameplay Programmer, VFX, SFX = Teyanna Calabrese

Level Designer and 3D Artist = Jhon Gomez

Project manager, 3D Artist, UI Artist = Henrique Zanchet
